title: #055 - ALESSANDRO NIVOLA - UNCLE JOEY'S JOINT
description:
Welcome to Uncle Joey's Joint.....

It’s Monday, April 12th.....

Today, we talked to our Friend and Actor, ALESSANDRO NIVOLA of The Many Saints of Newark......

This episode is brought to you by Bluechew & CBD Lion......

Go to https://go.bluechew.com/joeydiaz

Go to https://www.CBDLion.com

PROMO CODE: JOEY or CHURCH

And don’t forget.....

The Mind Of Joey Diaz is on PATREON:

https://www.patreon.com/joeydiaz

#JoeyDiaz #Madflavor #UncleJoeysJoint #AlessandroNivola #TheManySaintsOfNewark

Huge Thanks to BEN TELFORD for the Tremendous intro video.....

You can find Ben here:

Ben Telford Visuals

Cinematography and Visual Promotion Agency, Ontario, Canada

visuals@benjamintelford.com

Instagram: https://www.Instagram.com/b_telford or https://www.instagram.com/bentelfordvisuals
